attributes.action: make student railcards available at more suitable times to suit the educational needs of students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently we have noticed that student railcards are only valid after 10am, however we feel that this is not a satisfactory time for the use of student railcards to begin. This is because most students need to be at their place of education at 9am, therefore they will be travelling before this time.
